sentences.sentence: He had an encyclopedic knowledge of drugs.
She has an encyclopedic knowledge of natural history.
sentences.translation: 她具有广博的自然史知识。

sentences.sentence: He had a hard professional competence and an encyclopedic knowledge of his adopted country, an in-depth learning uncorrupted by vague idealism.
sentences.translation: 他有着扎实的专业功底和对他所选择的国家的广博的了解，一场不为模糊的理想主义所腐蚀的深入学习。
